attributes.action: lift the ban on feeding pigeons which presently decrees them to death by slow starvation
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The ban imposed on the feeding of pigeons in Trafalger Square and in other areas and cities of the U.K. is inhumane and also infringes the human rights of those who believe birds have a right to life and not slow starvation, and as such all bans should be lifted.
